Literature Review: The use of microdata for macro-finance has gained significant attention in recent years, as researchers seek to better understand the impact of financial frictions on the economy. Financial frictions, such as limited access to capital, can lead to misallocation of resources across firms, resulting in aggregate losses. This literature review aims to provide an overview of the current state of research on estimating these losses using microdata.
